abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid32247326, pmid32247931, pmid32247323, pmid32247322, pmid32248565, pmid32247381, pmid32247926, pmid32247925, pmid32247320, pmid32247927, pmid32247928, pmid32247324
name: Covid-19 LST Report 2020.04.06
